attributes.action: Create 2 separate written papers for the drama GCSE
attributes.background: The current paper has 3 sections and is essay and description based. Section A (multiple choice), Section B (Blood brothers (Description and very technical)) and Section C (Billy Elliot (essay)). This is 1h 45. There should be 2. 1 - 10 multiple choice and Blood brothers. 2 - Billy Elliot essay. :-)

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for. 
 
Decisions about your GCSE Drama written exam is a matter for the exam board you are using, not the UK Government or Parliament.
